statements: DELETE FROM drip_email_campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-06-30' AND customer_behavior_trigger = 'click_action'
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE trigger_event = 'User Registration';
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Spring Sale' AND trigger_event = 'User Registration';
DELETE FROM campaign_history WHERE template_id = 200 AND lead_id = 150;
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE trigger_id = 3 AND send_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM drip_campaigns WHERE active = false;
